intro.p: The Federal Reserve wants to get an idea of how Americans feel about the Economy. In order to get the information, the Fed partnered with Quinnipiac University to send a survey to 950 randomly selected U.S. Adults. Survey respondents completed the survey online using a code provided in the invitation. The survey was available in English and {{language}}.

Survey respondents were asked to decide to what degree they agreed with the following statements. The possible answer were "Strongly Agree", "Agree", "Neither Agree or Disagree", "Disagree", "Strongly Disagree".

item.p: The US economy was absolutely trashed by the closures during the pandemic.
The people responsible for taking care of the US economy have done a fantastic job setting it up to recover quickly.

intro.p: {{sample}} residents responded to the survey. {{result_1}}% of respondents said that they {{agree_1}} that the US economy was absolutely trashed by the closures during the pandemic and {{result_2}}% said that they {{agree_2}} that the people responsible for taking care of the US economy have done a fantastic job setting it up to recover quickly.
